items.title: Tap into 25W Qi2.2 wireless charging speeds on the go with this 10K MagSafe power bank down at $55 low
items.summary:
Courtesy of UGREEN’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its Qi2.2 25W 10,000mAh MagFlow power bank for $54.99 shipped. This is originally a $90 unit that’s lately been going for $70. Today’s 39% discount on its listed price shaves an additional $15 off to land it $5 below its previous all-time low. It remains one of the few 25W Qi2.2-certified battery packs you can get for your everyday carry, and it’s available at a solid price today. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this unit, and you can learn more about it below.

items.summary:
We’re tracking some great $799.99 shipped. This model was introduced last August as the “world’s fastest OLED monitor” and it hit the shelves shortly after in December at $1,000. It’s now seeing its first big price drop at 20% off – matched directly at LG. Today’s deal shaves $200 off its usual going rate to mark a new best price to beat.
